statements: UPDATE game_configurations SET theme = 'Dark', difficulty_level = 3 WHERE player_id = 100;
UPDATE game_configurations SET sound_enabled = true, theme = 'Light' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE game_configurations SET theme='Dark', sound_enabled=true WHERE id=1;
UPDATE game_configurations SET sound_enabled=false, difficulty_level=3 WHERE player_id=5;
UPDATE game_configurations SET game_setting_1 = 'easy', game_setting_2 = 'high' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_experiences SET level = 5, experience_points = 100 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE game_configurations SET game_setting_1 = 'new_value_1' WHERE player_id = 100;
UPDATE player_experiences SET level = 5, experience_points = experience_points + 100 WHERE player_id = 200;
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value='High' WHERE setting_name='Difficulty'
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_level=10, player_score=1500 WHERE player_name='Alice'
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = 'new_value' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE player_preferences SET favorite_game = 'Chess' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE GameConfigurations SET config_value = 'Easy' WHERE config_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerProfiles SET player_email = 'newemail@example.com', player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE GameConfigurations SET config_value = 'New Value' WHERE config_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerProfiles SET player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 5;
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = 'Easy' WHERE setting_name = 'Difficulty'
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_level = 10, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 101
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE player_scores SET score_value = 500 WHERE player_id = 456 AND level_id = 789;
